name: Avoid unreferenced Functions  (Shell)
description: This rule searches all the unreferenced Shell Functions.
output:
The report lists all the  unreferenced Shell Functions

It provides following information: 
- Function full name
rationale: Unreferenced code may be the symptom of Dead Code. Dead Code must be avoided as it makes source code less readable and increases the cost of the software maintenance.
remediation: Try to reduce the number of unreferenced Shell Function.
